nodes.text: A mission was undertaken by Jedi General Ki-Adi-Mundi in 22 BBY during the Clone Wars to investigate a rumor of trouble near the planet Barab I at the edge of the civilized galaxy. Mundi was defeated and almost killed during his mission. Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi had a vision of Mundi's mission during his travel to the planet Zigoola.
The mission was first mentioned in The Clone Wars: Wild Space, a 2008 novel written by Karen Miller.
